name: More
description: You deserve MORE. MORE is the latest innovation in nightlife, live entertainment and membership. A membership to MORE will give you preferred access to nightclubs in Los Angeles, New York, Las Vegas and Orange County. Skip the line, go right to your table, show off to your friends or hide from the world. Thatâ€™s MORE. MORE members also have growing list of other benefits ranging from special rates at hotels, private parties, personal training, sporting events, and access to a fleet of exotic cars. Is this for everyone? No. Only 6000 people in the world will qualify to be MORE members. MORE membership requires the purchase of 6000 MORE coins. However the number of coins is limited to allow for 5000 members worldwide. MORE coins trade on various cryptocurrency exchanges throughout the world. We recommend Bittrex.com to obtain your MORE membership tokens. The price of a membership is based on the market price for the coin. Coins (and your membership) may be sold by you at any time without restriction. MORE members have access to reciprocal clubs around the country in addition to our home clubs. MORE members may also spend cryptocurrency for various club services. However, we happy work with members who use more traditional forms of payment. MORE membership opens one to new experiences and new opportunities.
